summary:
same as steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=162544034
Just used seperate textures for the Armor so it won´t be affected by retexture mods.
descriptionHtml:
same as steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=162544034
Just used seperate textures for the Armor so it won´t be affected by retexture mods.

Extract it into Data folder to install.
----------------------------------------------------------------
Enables you to craft an unenchanted version of Nightingale Armor at the skyforge after completing the quest \'\'Trinity Restored\'\'.
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Upon Completing the Quest \'\'Darkness Returns\'\' the Dragonborn recieves  \'\'Nocturnal\'s Favor\'\',
increasing the Armor Rating for the craftable Nightingale Armor to the same AR as Dragonscale Armor.
 (applies to already crafted and newly crafted armor) 
(! requires SKSE ! get it here: http://skse.silverlock.org/)

Should you have already completed the quest before using this mod, the effect won´t be added. To fix this recomplete the quest via console:
setStage TG09 200
----------------------------------------------------------------

(category: Dragon)
(Arcane Blacksmithing Perk required)

Materials needed:

Ebony Ingot
Leather
Leather Strips
Void Salts
(count varies)

-Temper with Dragonscales (receives boost with DragonArmor perk)

-----------------------------------------------------------------

possible compatibility issues:

-Everything that meddles with quest TG08a(Trinity Restored) or TG09(Darkness Returns) could (but doesn´t necessarily have to) lead to issues.
author: Neodymus
